channel.title: 🏢 King Abdullah University of Science and Technology on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 King Abdullah University of Science and Technology on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: 4D-Bench: Benchmarking Multi-modal Large Language Models for 4D Object Understanding
item.description: 4D-Bench: The first benchmark for assessing MLLMs in 4D object understanding, revealing weak temporal understanding and the need for advancements.

item.title: Towards Data-Efficient Pretraining for Atomic Property Prediction
item.description: High-quality, task-relevant pretraining data surpasses large-scale pretraining in atomic property prediction, achieving comparable performance at 1/24th the computational cost.
